Increase the resilience to disinformation of the end subjects or other parts of the underlying system
Create alternative channels, messages etc in disinformation-prone systems
Make disinformation objects, mechanisms, messaging etc visible
Slow down transmission or uptake of disinformation objects, messaging etc
Remove disinformation objects from the system
Add artefacts to the underlying system that deliberately confound disinformation monitoring
Dilute disinformation artefacts and messaging with other content (kittens!)
Create and distribute alternative messages to disinformation
Verify objects, content, connections etc. Includes fact-checking
Clean unneeded resources (accounts etc) from the underlying system so they can't be used in disinformation
Target the components of a disinformation campaign
Reduce the resources available to disinformation creators
